exclusion:
1. Pushing all four buttons for 5 sec. will turn the fob into management mode. Management mode will time out after 10 sec
  2.  Button 3 confirms standard inclusion/exclusion by a primary controller,
inclusion:
1. Pushing all four buttons for 5 sec. will turn the fob into management mode. Management mode will time out after 10 sec
  2.  Button 3 confirms standard inclusion/exclusion by a primary controller,
label: ZME_KFOB-S
overview:
The Z-Wave.Me Key Fob is a Z-Wave device that can both control other Z-Wave devices and activate predefined scenes in an IP gateway. Although it is controlling other devices the fob can?t act as Z-Wave network controller (primary or secondary) and will always need a Z-Wave network controller to be included into a Z-Wave network. The Key Fob can be used in five different modes that are picked by configuration commands:

  1. Direct Control of associated Devices with On/Off/Dim commands
  2. Direct Control of associated Devices with On/Off commands
  3. Switch All On/Off
  4. Scene Activation in IP Gateway
  5. Direct Activation of preconfigured Scenes
  6. Direct Control of Devices in proximity
wakeup:
1. Pushing all four buttons for 5 sec. will turn the fob into management mode. Management mode will time out after 10 sec
  2. Button 2 issues a node information frame or wakeup notification

category.label: Remote Control
category.description: Any portable or hand-held device that controls the status of something, e.g. remote control, keyfob etc.

parameters.label: Button 1 and 3 pair mode
parameters.overview: In separate mode button 1 works with group A, button 3 with groups C. Click is On, Hold is dimming Up, Double click is Off, Click-Hold is dimming Down. In pair button 1/3 are Up/Down correspondingly. Click is On/Off, Hold is dimming Up/Down. Single clicks works with group A, double click with group C. Default Value: 01

parameters.label: Button 2 and 4 pair mode
parameters.overview: In separate mode button 2 works with control group B, button 4 with control group D. Click is On, Hold is dimming Up, Double click is Off, Click-Hold is dimming Down. In pair button B/D are Up/Down correspondingly. Click is On/Off, Hold is dimming Up/Down. Single clicks works with group B, double click with group D. Default Value: 01

parameters.label: Command to Control Group A
parameters.description: Set Command to Control Group A
parameters.overview: This parameter defines the command to be sent to devices of control group A when the related button is pressed. Default Value: 08

parameters.label: Command to Control Group B
parameters.description: Set Command to Control Group B
parameters.overview: This parameter defines the command to be sent to devices of control group B when the related button is pressed. Default Value: 08

parameters.label: Command to Control Group C
parameters.description: Set  Command to Control Group C
parameters.overview: This parameter defines the command to be sent to devices of control group C when the related button is pressed. Default Value: 08

parameters.label: Command to Control Group D
parameters.description: Set Command to Control Group D
parameters.overview: This parameter defines the command to be sent to devices of control group D when the related button is pressed. Default Value: 08

parameters.label: Send the following Switch All commands
parameters.description: Set Send the following Switch All commands

parameters.label: Blocks wakeup even when wakeup interval is set
parameters.description: Set Blocks wakeup even when wakeup interval is set
parameters.overview:
If the KFOB wakes up and there is no controller nearby, several unsuccessful communication attempts will drain battery
Size: 1 Byte, Default Value: 00

options.label: Wakeup is possible if configured accordingly

parameters.label: Send unsolicited Battery Report on Wake Up
parameters.description: Set Send unsolicited Battery Report on Wake Up
parameters.overview: Set Send unsolicited Battery Report on Wake Up

options.label: To same node as wake up notification

associations.label: Control Group A
associations.overview: Control Group A, controlled by button 1 or single clicks of buttons

associations.label: Control Group B
associations.overview: Control Group B, controlled by button 2 or single clicks of buttons 2

associations.label: Control Group C
associations.overview: Control Group C, controlled by button 3 or double clicks of buttons 1

associations.label: Control Group D
associations.overview: Control Group D, controlled by button 4 or double clicks of buttons 2
